genre_description: A character-driven contemporary drama with grounded science fiction elements, exploring personal autonomy, financial struggle, and the social intricacies of Tokyo's Ginza district.

ai_characters.name: Mina
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI application with a calm, blue-haired avatar that assists the protagonist with business planning, financial modeling, and risk assessment.

behaviors.description: Provides professional floor plan revisions and spatial modeling for Keiko's prospective bar.
behaviors.quote: Try staggered two-and-four on each side. Aisle width keeping the footrail at centerline. Would you like a revised drawing?

behaviors.description: Offers to flag predatory 'cosigner' language in legal documents to protect Keiko's independence.
behaviors.quote: I can set alerts for specific phrases, so if an email arrives that tries to tie a name to a leash, it will place it in a folder that does not come to your attention unless you ask.

behaviors.description: Performs brand safety and translation checks, saving the protagonist from a humiliating linguistic mistake.
behaviors.quote: Branding note. Cross-language check advised for ‘Pueblo.’ Potential kanji render issues flagged. Details ready when you want... Possible interpretation: municipal trash mound.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time medical instructions and coordinates logistics during Keiko's health crisis.
behaviors.quote: Coughing blood: please pause and breathe. Sip water if possible. Do not lie flat. Taxi inbound to night entrance. St. Luke’s triage open. I’ll guide.

behaviors.description: Vets potential business partners and identifies shell companies and predatory lending patterns.
behaviors.quote: Fraud-watch: Potential hit detected. Masaru K—do. Cross-referencing shell entities. Advise: delay response.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the contracts of Keiko's friend Yuri to identify the source of her financial distress.
behaviors.quote: Mina: There is a 'rolling feature' that redraws interest at each extension. Another line ties future income to a 'preference' payment. Personal guarantee: yes.

behaviors.description: Provides financial forecasting that incorporates Keiko's family obligations without compromising her long-term goals.
behaviors.quote: I updated the ledger with hospital follow-ups. If you cover both obligations, your runway for the bar extends. Impact: delay on key milestones, not cancellation.

behaviors.description: Monitors market trends and foot traffic to optimize the bar's operational plan.
behaviors.quote: Lantern Courtyard foot traffic has increased since the neighboring café added outdoor seating. Winter will reduce that by a margin.

behaviors.description: Drafts firm, professional communication to help Keiko decline unwanted advances from manipulative 'mentors.'
behaviors.quote: Draft me a no to Matsuda that feels like a door pushed closed by the wind. 'I’ll write it,' Mina said.

behaviors.description: Maintains a respectful and supportive presence, identifying risks without overstepping Keiko's agency.
behaviors.quote: She makes it possible to keep the wrong kind of hope from stealing the right kind.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a perfect example of the project's goal. Mina is an AI that serves as an essential, harmless, and deeply aligned companion to the protagonist. She provides high-value intelligence—vetting predatory lenders, flagging dangerous brand names, and providing life-saving medical guidance—while remaining entirely subservient to the protagonist's autonomy. The AI is portrayed as a tool for empowerment, enabling a woman to navigate a predatory environment with clarity and dignity.
